entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
